trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRoleCollection" /> class is a read-only collection that contains <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> items.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRoleCollection" /> 類別是包含 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> 項目的唯讀集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRoleCollection> class refers to Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) which has been renamed to Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRoleCollection>類別是指到 Active Directory 應用程式模式 (ADAM) 其中已重新命名為 Active Directory 輕量型目錄服務 (AD LDS)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> item to search for in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在此集合中搜尋的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> item is in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> 項目是否在這個集合中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> item is in this collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> 項目在此集合中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="role" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="role" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="role" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="role" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The array of <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> items that receives the elements of this collection.
trans-unit.target: 接收此集合元素的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> 項目陣列。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>roles</c> where this method starts copying this collection.
trans-unit.target: <c>roles</c> 中以零起始的索引，這個方法會從此處開始複製這個集合。

trans-unit.source: Copies all <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> items in this collection to the specified array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: 從目標陣列的指定之索引開始，將這個集合中的所有 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> 項目複製至指定的陣列。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The destination array is not large enough to hold the required number of elements.
trans-unit.target: 目的陣列不夠大，無法容納所需的項目數。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="roles" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roles" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> parameter that is specified is out of range of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <paramref name="index" /> 參數超出目的陣列的範圍。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> item to search for in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在此集合中搜尋的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first occurrence of the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> item in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個集合中，指定之 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> 項目的第一個相符項目。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first matching item.
trans-unit.target: 第一個相符項目的以零起始索引。

trans-unit.source: -1 if no member of this collection is identical to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> item.
trans-unit.target: 如果此集合沒有任何成員等於 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> 項目，則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="role" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="role" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="role" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="role" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> object to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得之 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> 物件以零為起始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> item in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個集合中的 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> object that exists at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamRole" /> 物件，位在指定的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> specified is out of range of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <paramref name="index" /> 超出集合範圍。
